title: Airline to cut 61 jobs at Logan Airport
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Business Piedmont Airlines, a subsidiary of American Airlines Group, says it will end its vendor services in Boston this November.
American Airlines passenger jets prepare for departure, near a terminal at Boston Logan International Airport.

(AP Photo/Steven Senne, File) Piedmont Airlines, a subsidiary of American Airlines Group, will cut 61 jobs at Boston Logan International Airport in November as it ends its ground handling services there.

title: Man arrested in R.I. after allegedly kidnapping elderly woman from outside Mass. restaurant

title: Driver dead, 3 juveniles injured in I-195 crash
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Local News State Police believe the driver suffered a medical emergency.
ShareSend this article to your social connections.
A single-car crash in Rehoboth left the driver dead and three juvenile passengers injured on Monday morning.

title: Museum of Science lets the public interact with robot dogs and humanoid robots

title: Aaron Boone pushes back against Alex Cora’s underdog label for Red Sox
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Red Sox "I think he’s played 'The Little Engine That Could' over there a little bit.
" Aaron Boone and the Yankees will host the Red Sox in a best-of-three playoff series.

(AP Photo/David Banks) By Conor Ryan September 30, 2025 | 6:18 AM 2 minutes to read A day after the Red Sox clinched their first playoff berth since 2021, Alex Cora didn’t mince words about Boston’s up-and-down 2025 campaign.

title: Little improvement to MCAS scores as districts work to reach prepandemic achievement

bullets: Local News English language arts scores for both third through eighth graders and 10th graders were 10 points behind 2019's scores.
